title: Christopher Mastropietro, is Relevance Realization Vervaeke's "God" #1?
description:
Christopher was a student of John Vervaeke, was mentored and in some ways apprenticed by him and now is a collaborator with John on the meaning Crisis work. He agreed to do a video with me and we had a good conversation talking about his life, religion and John Vervaeke's work.
